name: thepyramid
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 36 Theme: Ancient Technology

Explore the depth of an egyptian pyramid but beware of traps and other kinds of Ancient Technology... And don't let the mechanical anubis-guardian get you.
To trigger the "good end" you have to collect all five treasures in the pyramid. Maybe talking to the NPCs will help you to solve the puzzles.

Controls:

W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys Movement E / Spacebar Interact Mouse (Click to interact) Close ups / puzzles Esc Menu / close game from menu

Credits:

CEO, Programming Junber Graphics, Design NonSans Sound, Music Steamdragon
